channel.title: Got my first Mac today :)
channel.description:
I got a new Macbook pro today along with a 27inch iMac. I LOVE osx compared to windows it's simply amazing! What's your guys opinions on windows and osx xD?
**I seriously do not want to here i overpaid for my macbook, i know i did, and i do not care.

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Thug-life:

Aside from bring up two operating systems that have no relevance to the current topic. He bought a Mac, it didn’t have OS 9 or Windows 98 installed on it.

Facepalm. This is on topic. Apple made Mac OS 9, and Mac OS X . They are all OS’s as well. PLUS, Mac OS 9 is the predecessor of Mac OS X. If it wasn’t for the garbage of Mac OS 9, Mac OS X would not of came out for us to talk about abat having Mac OS X on his new computer.
…sigh…my original post simplified:
It is really great that you got an apple with Mac OS X ! It is such a great OS as compared to apples product before that,Mac OS 9…it was not good. I had a windows 98 that had lower specifications and could run faster and do things faster than a higher spec’d Mac OS 9. But yeah, good choice. Mac OS X is great. I really
hope you enjoy using your new computer ^^

Did I need to be flamed at for the above comment? Answer is no. Where has politeness gone on the internet anyways…? I also got flamed at for liking windows when you guys preferred mac. I like cake also, will you flames at me for liking cake because you do not?

‘and theres no guidelines or rules about rep.’
…should be for the people that abuse it… :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:33, topic:372306”]Okay i get it, you were referring to Mac os9 was so shitty that windows 98 was superior.
Although i disagree i get your point.
But it was the point of randomness and that nobody here was talking about os9 at all, so why bring it up?
That’s why were trolling you.[/quote]

Ah. Yes sorry. Can we get back on topix please? =]
And it is not the point of randomness to talk about Mac OS 9, since it it the predecessor of os Mac OS X. ( unless it isn’t ,and is also not made by apple? ) …anyways, I was just saying that I remember using it, and how great Mac OS X was of an improvement to it.

‘nobody’s trolling anyone, what the fuck’

We have a person here who makes sense?

  • Also, do not misuse the repp-ing system. I have not done anything wrong here to get rep removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

—Sigh—
Please don’t. I was about to add to my post…The first post was to just see Thug’s reaction. Trolling is very new to me =P , but I am not a troll. Yes, obvious troll is obvious XD ( not so much derailing…maybe though ), but I was going to add to my post , so I was not.
I am also myself an aspiring programmer… Back in 2006 / 07 moparscape wasn’t so full of aspiring programmers though…but yes, it is what Moparscape is for ( or else the TOS is Void )

Ah…so you are Liquid? I heard it was your birthday ! So I will wish you a happy birthday =P I just hope the cake is not a lie though.

Read full topic

item.description:

mopar fan:

Because you like turtles and Aaron doesn’t =P

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Because you like turtles and Aaron doesn’t =P
—Actually, I was agreeing with them that Mac OS X is a pretty cool, & good OS. But I was also saying that the OS before Mac OS X was horrible, and that Windows 98 was better. In my previous post I said they had about the same specs, but the Windows 98 was actually older and had lower specs, but somehow ran faster than Mac OS 9 & loaded things better.

Read full topic

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

WHY ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT WINDOWS 98 AND MAC OS 9

Read full topic

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:26, topic:372306"][quote author=mopar fan link=topic=468364.msg3425186#msg3425186 date=1291857301]

You have absolutely no idea what you are talking about & shut up about windows 98, you don’t deserve to talk about its awesome-ness.

No, I do not know enough about linux to really talk about it, I said that. ( I think I was like 12-ish when I did use Linux…it was all very new to me back then …and have not really been able to do anything with it since.)

Windows 98 is a great OS …I do not know what you are talking about =P ( Besides, the blue screen of death is a rare experience & not much of an inconvenience for me lol, just restart. Usually only came up when I did something wrong XD )

'You have absolutely no idea what you are talking about & shut up about windows 98, you don’t deserve to talk about its awesome-ness. ’

I do not think you have any clue what you are talking about… I do not think you know anything about me, and my personal experiences with computers.
Mac OS 9.2 was sh** for me, and barely loaded anything, and was slow as sh** The Mac OS 9.2’s got regular maintaining & hardware cleaning /vacuuming. My Windows 98 machine on the other hand , never got cleaned, and was dusty as ****… it should of went up in flames from the dust clogging up the hardware. Same specs for both. The Windows 98 computer ran faster, loaded things better…and is also the better OS. Mac only beat Windows 98 with their OS X =P

Please don’t flame…if you have something very negative to say, do not say it…but I won’t stop you if you do decide to do something so pointless…

Oh well. If you say something about Windows someone will bound to flame at you for mentioning it if they likez teh Mac =P

‘the mac is just for looks’

Oh come on, give it more credit than that , at least it works right? It does look really cool though. ( Which is why some people decided to make a Mac OS toolbar for Windows…you know the one at the bottom of the screen which hosts your icons and programs and such .Their just jealous of the Mac’s cool looks and wished they had a Mac for it’s cool looks, so imported one to Windows.)

‘omg I still have an old laptop with win3.1… 8MB ram bitches’

That is so…sweetly…sweet. I cannot descibe the amount of epic there. I didn’t even know laptops were made when windows 3.1 was out? That is sooo cool Most Epic.
[/quote]

You do not understand how stupid you look right now, all you are doing is speaking about a topic that no one gives a shit about, stop talking to hear yourself talk, 'Aaron.[/quote]

I believe your the one who initiated this topic. I wouldn’t have posted it if you didn’t. And if you did not care, why did you post that? I am obviously not talking to myself since you posted that idiotic post. And if the original topic poster did not care, why did he make this topic then?
Look, if I don’t care, and if you don’t care, then we are in agreement. Stop flaming. There is no argument here. You might just end up flaming more than my friend is flaming. Please contribute to the topic, and if you can’t, and have anything negative to say, keep to to yourself, no one cares. Look 'Aaron, you are the one with the problem. Everyone is entitled to their opinion. You have not lived my life. My experiences are different than yours. You think slightly differently. You do not agree with me. You know nothing about my life and experiences. Keep Quiet, who cares. Gut Zu Wissen? Guten. I have not said anything bad about you ever, so why do this for me?
Ich danken jeder hasst mich hier nur weil ich bin Deutsch…

’
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0MRmxfLuNto’
LOL YES! Where did you find that ? That is hilarious! I will most definitely applaud you XD

And, to the one keeping on topic and not flaming as flaming as Aaron is ( Javafire ):
[i]omg I still have an old laptop with win3.1… 8MB ram bitches

i have a desktop ibm with windows 2 suck on that.[/i]

Nice, I do not know anyone that has ever had Windows 2000. Plus it’s an IBM so +++ You are awsome =P

Read full topic

No, I do not know enough about linux to really talk about it, I said that. ( I think I was like 12-ish when I did use Linux…it was all very new to me back then …and have not really been able to do anything with it since.)

Windows 98 is a great OS …I do not know what you are talking about =P ( Besides, the blue screen of death is a rare experience & not much of an inconvenience for me lol, just restart. Usually only came up when I did something wrong XD )

‘You have absolutely no idea what you are talking about & shut up about windows 98.’

I do not think you have any clue what you are talking about… I do not think you know anything about me, and my personal experiences with computers.
Mac OS 9.2 was sh** for me, and barely loaded anything, and was slow as sh** The Mac OS 9.2’s got regular maintaining & hardware cleaning /vacuuming. My Windows 98 machine on the other hand , never got cleaned, and was dusty as ****… it should of went up in flames from the dust clogging up the hardware. Same specs for both. The Windows 98 computer ran faster, loaded things better…and is also the better OS. Mac only beat Windows 98 with their OS X =P

Please don’t flame…if you have something very negative to say, do not say it…but I won’t stop you if you do decide to do something so pointless…

Oh well. If you say something about Windows someone will bound to flame at you for mentioning it if they likez teh Mac =P

‘the mac is just for looks’

Oh come on, give it more credit than that , at least it works right? It does look really cool though. ( Which is why some people decided to make a Mac OS toolbar for Windows…you know the one at the bottom of the screen which hosts your icons and programs and such .Their just jealous of the Mac’s cool looks and wished they had a Mac for it’s cool looks, so imported one to Windows.)

‘omg I still have an old laptop with win3.1… 8MB ram bitches’

That is so…sweetly…sweet. I cannot descibe the amount of epic there. I didn’t even know laptops were made when windows 3.1 was out? That is sooo cool Most Epic.[/quote]

You do not understand how stupid you look right now, all you are doing is speaking about a topic that no one gives a shit about, stop talking to hear yourself talk.

Please don’t flame…if you have something very negative to say, do not say it…but I won’t stop you if you do decide to do something so pointless…

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

`Aaron:

You have absolutely no idea what you are talking about & shut up about windows 98, you don’t deserve to talk about its awesome-ness.

No, I do not know enough about linux to really talk about it, I said that. ( I think I was like 12-ish when I did use Linux…it was all very new to me back then …and have not really been able to do anything with it since.)

Windows 98 is a great OS …I do not know what you are talking about =P ( Besides, the blue screen of death is a rare experience & not much of an inconvenience for me lol, just restart. Usually only came up when I did something wrong XD )

'You have absolutely no idea what you are talking about & shut up about windows 98, you don’t deserve to talk about its awesome-ness. ’

I do not think you have any clue what you are talking about… I do not think you know anything about me, and my personal experiences with computers.
Mac OS 9.2 was sh** for me, and barely loaded anything, and was slow as sh** The Mac OS 9.2’s got regular maintaining & hardware cleaning /vacuuming. My Windows 98 machine on the other hand , never got cleaned, and was dusty as ****… it should of went up in flames from the dust clogging up the hardware. Same specs for both. The Windows 98 computer ran faster, loaded things better…and is also the better OS. Mac only beat Windows 98 with their OS X =P

Please don’t flame…if you have something very negative to say, do not say it…but I won’t stop you if you do decide to do something so pointless…

Oh well. If you say something about Windows someone will bound to flame at you for mentioning it if they likez teh Mac =P

‘the mac is just for looks’

Oh come on, give it more credit than that , at least it works right? It does look really cool though. ( Which is why some people decided to make a Mac OS toolbar for Windows…you know the one at the bottom of the screen which hosts your icons and programs and such .Their just jealous of the Mac’s cool looks and wished they had a Mac for it’s cool looks, so imported one to Windows.)

‘omg I still have an old laptop with win3.1… 8MB ram bitches’

That is so…sweetly…sweet. I cannot descibe the amount of epic there. I didn’t even know laptops were made when windows 3.1 was out? That is sooo cool Most Epic.

Read full topic

item.title: Got my first Mac today :)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:17, topic:372306”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=468364.msg3424930#msg3424930 date=1291843895]
Linux = free so it must be the other way around? /facepalm
[/quote]

I seriously do not want to here i overpaid for my macbook, i know i did, and i do not care.

PRICE IS NOT AN ISSUE OSX IS COOL[/quote]

Right. OSX ist good & cool. OS 9.2 is sh** , buggy & crashes alot. Seriously, never get Mac OS 9.2…my old school had it, and it was not very good. Windows 98 is much better than Mac OS 9.2, more stable …faster… so if you want to get an older OS for some reason, if you even consider Mac OS 9.2 ( i’ll shoot you { JK , or am I? …Hmm… } ), don’t get Mac OS 9.2, instead just get Windows 98.
…But anyways Mac OS X is really good.
I find linux kinda hard to use, then again only used it three times, so never had time to get used to it. I tried downloading and installing a game, but it would not let me, and gave me some roller thing ( might of been a winzip alternative, but it did this for all files, and wouldn’t let me do anything…)
I like windows the best though. Been using it since windows 3.2 ( if you find that hard to believe? ) my old elementary school had some because they couldn’t afford the newer windows 95/98 lol. Out of all the OS’s though, I like windows 98 the best XD , windows 7 is second =P

Read full topic
